content.html:
ಕುವೆಂಪು, ರೈತನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ

ಕರಿಯರದೊ ಬಿಳಿಯರದೊ ಯಾರದಾದರೆ ಏನು ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯವಾವಗಂ ಸುಲಿಗೆ ರೈತರಿಗೆ ವಿಜಯನಗರವೊ ಮೊಗಲರಾಳ್ವಿಕೆಯೊ ಇಂಗ್ಲಿಷರೊ ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಜಿಗಣೆಗಳೆ ನನ್ನ ನೆತ್ತರಿಗೆ ಕತ್ತಿ ಪರದೇಶಿಯಾದರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ನೋವೆ ನಮ್ಮವರೆ ಹದಹಾಕಿ ತಿವಿದರದು ಹೂವೆ?

Why I like kuvempu so much? One example is this poem.

https://honalu.net/2021/02/02/%E0%B2%95%E0%B3%81%E0%B2%B5%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%AA%E0%B3%81-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%B5%E0%B2%A8%E0%B2%97%E0%B2%B3-%E0%B2%93%E0%B2%A6%E0%B3%81-6%E0%B2%A8%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%AF-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%A4/
content.value:
ಕುವೆಂಪು, ರೈತನ ದೃಷ್ಟಿ
ಕರಿಯರದೊ ಬಿಳಿಯರದೊ ಯಾರದಾದರೆ ಏನು
ಸಾಮ್ರಾಜ್ಯವಾವಗಂ ಸುಲಿಗೆ ರೈತರಿಗೆ
ವಿಜಯನಗರವೊ ಮೊಗಲರಾಳ್ವಿಕೆಯೊ ಇಂಗ್ಲಿಷರೊ
ಎಲ್ಲರೂ ಜಿಗಣೆಗಳೆ ನನ್ನ ನೆತ್ತರಿಗೆ
ಕತ್ತಿ ಪರದೇಶಿಯಾದರೆ ಮಾತ್ರ ನೋವೆ
ನಮ್ಮವರೆ ಹದಹಾಕಿ ತಿವಿದರದು ಹೂವೆ?
Why I like kuvempu so much? One example is this poem.
https://honalu.net/2021/02/02/%E0%B2%95%E0%B3%81%E0%B2%B5%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%AA%E0%B3%81-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%B5%E0%B2%A8%E0%B2%97%E0%B2%B3-%E0%B2%93%E0%B2%A6%E0%B3%81-6%E0%B2%A8%E0%B3%86%E0%B2%AF-%E0%B2%95%E0%B2%82%E0%B2%A4/

One is a is a simple layered skirt tutorial: https://mlemmer.org/blog/layered_skirt_tutorial/

content.html:
#introduction

I'm a comp-sci Ph.D. currently working on #MachineTranslation.

I am deeply interested in #cryptic #crosswords. I set under the pseudonym #Gussalufz. Site: https://gussalufz.com.

I also work on #OpenSource #crossword software.

#Exolve (https://exolve.app) is my software for interactively solving crosswords, and #Exet (https://exet.app) is my webapp for constructing crosswords (lots of extras for cryptic clues).

Also: #running, #beer, #wine, #TableTennis, #dogs.

Site: https://gussalufz.com.I also work on #OpenSource #crossword software.#Exolve (https://exolve.app) is my software for interactively solving crosswords, and #Exet (https://exet.app) is my webapp for constructing crosswords (lots of extras for cryptic clues).Also: #running, #beer, #wine, #TableTennis, #dogs.

content.html:
I look forward to seeing the completed PR for Gnome Software with the Open Source software only filter. 😁

It will be a big improvement brought by Gnome 44 and going back to promoting all the great Free Software available instead of the often insecure and buggy closed source alternatives. 💪

https://gitlab.gnome.org/GNOME/gnome-software/-/merge_requests/1515

#gnome #gnome44 #opensource #freesoftware #foss #license #gnomesoftware

content.html:
The protesters are already having success. Keep up the pressure!

The specialized police unit that included at least some of the Memphis officers involved in the fatal beating of #TyreNichols was disbanded on Saturday as more protests took place in U.S. cities a day after harrowing video of the attack was released.

In a statement, the police department said it was permanently deactivating the SCORPION unit
https://www.reuters.com/world/us/memphis-disbands-police-unit-fatal-beating-more-protests-expected-2023-01-28/

content.html:
What's the point of being a democracy if you can't watch a documentary?

Universities which are expected to make students read and watch everything are suspending students. For what?

https://www.thenewsminute.com/article/rajasthan-central-university-suspends-ten-students-watching-bbc-documentary-172591

content.html: Remember these? Original Lytro! Lightfield cameras of the future! I grabbed a few off eBay some time ago and took a peek at the firmware. Found secret unlock that enables full remote control of all camera features. Full writeup here: https://github.com/ea/lytro_unlock

content.html: I’m devastated and outraged by the murder of Tyre Nichols. Another Black man brutally killed by police. This recurring nightmare has to end. Cameras and training aren’t enough to change law enforcement cultures that devalue certain lives, rooted in systemic racism and violence. #TyreNichols
content.value: I’m devastated and outraged by the murder of Tyre Nichols. Another Black man brutally killed by police. This recurring nightmare has to end. Cameras and training aren’t enough to change law enforcement cultures that devalue certain lives, rooted in systemic racism and violence. #TyreNichols

content.html:
Five years ago (Monday the 23rd) the @W3C Social Web Working Group published the WebSub Recommendation^1

The test suites https://websub.rocks/ for Publishers, Subscribers, and Hubs are still up & running, as are the vast majority of implementations documented in the implementation report.

My site supports the publishing side of WebSub via the Superfeedr Hub^2 and there are many more supporting sites^3.

Beyond publishing blog posts and realtime updates in social readers^4, there are additional WebSub use-cases such as real time #IndieWeb search^5 results, like Technorati except opt-in via WebSub subscriptions, and without any polling.

Such diverse use-cases are one of the benefits of building-block^6 standards^7 like WebSub.

If you create a new WebSub implementation, be sure to test it with the test suite^8 and add your results to the WebSub Implementation Reports repo^9.

Got questions about WebSub? Ask in https://chat.indieweb.org/dev


This is day 23 of #100DaysOfIndieWeb #100Days

← Day 22: https://tantek.com/2023/026/t1/indieweb-priorities-balance
→ 🔮


^1 https://www.w3.org/TR/2018/REC-websub-20180123/
^2 https://pubsubhubbub.superfeedr.com/
^3 https://indieweb.org/WebSub#IndieWeb_Examples
^4 https://indieweb.org/social_reader
^5 https://indieweb.org/IndieWeb_Search
^6 https://indieweb.org/building-blocks
^7 https://spec.indieweb.org/
^8 https://websub.rocks/
^9 https://websub.net/implementation-reports

content.html:
Bengaluru Airport (KIA) Estimated Wait Time Data

KIA (Kempegowda International Airport Bengaluru) has interesting and valuable data about wait times at various places. They show it on overhead displays in the airport and on their website. Over time, this data can help make decisions. Hence I started saving it. Here is how you can get it.

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/28/bengaluru-airport-kia-estimated-wait-time-data/

content.html:
Weekly Notes 04/2023

I was invited to BuzzWomen's all-hands meetup. One of their long-term employees used the word "ಕಾಳಜಿ" (Kāḷaji) as a reason for being loyal to BuzzWomen. The direct translation is "concern," but it's more like care + kindness + concern. I love the usage of the word. One will work for a long time for an organization that shows "ಕಾಳಜಿ". I am happy that BuzzWomen is one such organization.

https://thejeshgn.com/2023/01/27/weekly-notes-04-2023/
content.value:
Weekly Notes 04/2023
I was invited to BuzzWomen's all-hands meetup. One of their long-term employees used the word "ಕಾಳಜಿ" (Kāḷaji) as a reason for being loyal to BuzzWomen. The direct translation is "concern," but it's more like care + kindness + concern. I love the usage of the word. One will work for a long time for an organization that shows "ಕಾಳಜಿ". I am happy that BuzzWomen is one such organization.
